headline: If You Invested $10K In Kroger Stock 10 Years Ago, How Much Would You Have Now?
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) is a food and drug retailer in the U.S. The company operates combination food and drug stores, multi-department stores, marketplace stores, and price impact warehouses. It is set to report its Q1 2025 earnings on June 20. Wall Street analysts expect the company to post EPS of $1.54, up from $1.43 in the year-ago period. According to Benzinga Pro, quarterly revenue is expected to reach $45.17 billion, down from $45.27 billion a year earlier. Don't Miss: Many are using retirement
